question: Which of the following is not a part of the Directive Principles of State Policy?
option2: Free education of children up to the age of fourteen
option4: Protection of consumption of Intoxicating drinks
answer: Free education of children up to the age of fourteen
explanation: The provision for free and compulsory education for all children until they complete the age of fourteen years was mentioned under Article 45 of the Directive Principles of State Policy but in 2002 (86th Amendment) the above provision became a Fundamental Right under Article 21-A.
